faq.question: Q: What are Home cleaning Services?
faq.answer: Ans: Home cleaning is the process of removing trash, mess, dirt from the house. It includes cleaning surfaces, tidying, discarding refuse, and vacuuming. It can also involve cleaning the outside area. If you search for high-quality house cleaning services in Delhi NCR, Expert Home Cleaning Services is the ideal place for you.

faq.question: Q: What kind of material and equipment do we use?
faq.answer: Ans: Our professional cleaners use all kinds of essential material and equipment needed to clean the house, such as scrubbing brush, buckets, brooms, floor cleaning cloth, mobs, microfiber cloth, buckets, detergents, acids, degreasers, etc. For the best house cleaning services in Delhi NCR, you can contact Expert Home Cleaning Services.

faq.question: Q: Why do I need a Home deep cleaning?
faq.answer: Ans: Home cleaning is an integrated part of maintaining hygiene. Our service provider will clean all the parts of your house, which are inaccessible by you, such as inside the kitchen sink pipes, exhaust pipes, ceiling fans, top of almirahs. Our goal is to promote wellness among our customers by offering the best house cleaning services in Delhi NCR.

faq.question: Q: How much time will it take to deep clean my home?
faq.answer: Ans: It can take approximately 1 to 4 hours to deep clean the house depending on the area, number of rooms, bathrooms, etc. Cleaning home appliances can be a little time-consuming. For house cleaning in Delhi NCR, give a call to Expert Home Cleaning Services.

faq.question: Q: How often should I get my home deep cleaned?
faq.answer: Ans: We recommend you to deep clean your house twice a month, including cleaning on home appliances, top of the almirahs, pipes, exhaust fans, ceiling fans, etc. Besides that, you can choose to do wiping once a week to prevent dirt and dust on the home appliances. You can give a call to house deep cleaning services in Delhi NCR for reliable services.
